name: Type Train
description:
V1.1 has very minor post jam bug fixes, we recommend playing that version.

Welcome to Type Train.  Your goal as a moist train conductor is to make it to the last station on your line, Winsville, earning stars along the way for carrying valuable cargo.

There are 10 stops on your journey, and at each stop you will have the opportunity to add cars and staff to your train. Adding train cars will get you more points, but also make operating the train more difficult. Adding staff will take some of the tasks away from you to make running the train easier.

Controls:

Click to pick cards, click+drag to assign staff to work slots

Keyboard keys as prompted to move to cars and complete tasks (0-9 and letters)

Left/Right arrow key to view next/previous car

Updates:

  • 1.1 
    • [Fix] Made scores count on the final level
    • [Fix] Made final score UI visible on small screens
